Culture
Our employees are central to all that we do. 
Together we create a culture that drives our performance.
Our culture enables our global team of 
employees to deliver our key differentiator -- The Power of Agility™ . This is our competitive 
advantage, and how our global team of employees delivers on our brand promise every day.
